attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unblock the roads by creating bus lay-bys.  Every time a bus pulls up on the road it creates a blockage.
Stop traffic parking on main roads.  The roads are there to move traffic.  Build bridges and tunnels to keep traffic flowing.  How much fuel is wasted by all the blockages on the roads.  Build cycle lanes away from traffic, give everyone the opportunity to use bicycles safely.
